description: These creamy chicken Caesar lettuce cups make a delicious entree or light lunch.
name: Chicken Caesar Lettuce Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g roast chicken breast, 2 large fillets, skinless and cooked
2 heads little gem lettuce, leaves separated
70g parmesan, shaved with a vegetable peeled

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the chicken into bitesize pieces and tip into a bowl with yoghurt and Caesar dressing. Toss well to coat.
Arrange the little gem leaves on a plate and divide the chicken between them. Top each with croutons and parmesan shavings, season with cracked black pepper and serve.
